item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Fu-Yun Wang . I was born in 2001 and was admitted to the School of artificial Intelligence of Nanjing University in 2019 through the Chinese college entrance examination. From June 2021 to the present, I have been engaged in the field of machine learning under the supervision of teacher Ye from LAMDA, led by professor Zhi-Hua Zhou. Up to now, my research interests include Continual Learning, Bayesian Methods, Machine Learning Theory and Reinforcement Learning.
